basFtdMib.name: basFtdMib
basFtdMib.contactinfo: Tech Support Broadband Access Systems 4 Technology Drive Westborough, MA 01581 U.S.A. 508-366-8833 support@basystems.com
basFtdMib.description: This MIB module defines the configuration and status MIB objects for a Broadband Access System FTD objects.

basFtdHeartBeatTimer.name: basFtdHeartBeatTimer
basFtdHeartBeatTimer.description: Timer value in seconds for the FTD heartbeat.

basFtdTableEligibilityCounter.name: basFtdTableEligibilityCounter
basFtdTableEligibilityCounter.description: Count of the FTD heartbeat timeouts since receiving a table request, i.e. an eligibility cycle.

basFtdTableEligibilityCounterThreshold.name: basFtdTableEligibilityCounterThreshold
basFtdTableEligibilityCounterThreshold.description: Counter threshold (table eligibility counter) defining a time window used to accumulate table requests and stagger their distribution.

basFtdIdleCounter.name: basFtdIdleCounter
basFtdIdleCounter.description: Count of the FTD heartbeat timeouts in an idle state.

basFtdIdleCounterThreshold.name: basFtdIdleCounterThreshold
basFtdIdleCounterThreshold.description: Counter threshold (idle counter) defining a time window ( in heartbeat units ) used to stagger the transmission of revision packets.

basFtdTableRequestCounter.name: basFtdTableRequestCounter
basFtdTableRequestCounter.description: Count of FTD table requests during an eligibility cycle.

basFtdPendingCallbackCounter.name: basFtdPendingCallbackCounter
basFtdPendingCallbackCounter.description: Count of the FTD heartbeat timeouts accumulated while a callback is pending, i.e. a pending cycle.

basFtdPendingCallbackThreshold.name: basFtdPendingCallbackThreshold
basFtdPendingCallbackThreshold.description: Counter threshold (pending callback counter) defining a maximum time window to wait for a callback.

basFtdPurgeConfiguration.name: basFtdPurgeConfiguration
basFtdPurgeConfiguration.description: Configuration for when to purge the forwarding table: immediately or delayed (after a new table has been received).

basFtdUpdateRequests.name: basFtdUpdateRequests
basFtdUpdateRequests.description: Count of the total number of update requests.

basFtdUpdatepackets.name: basFtdUpdatepackets
basFtdUpdatepackets.description: Count of the total number of update packets.

basFtdTableRequests.name: basFtdTableRequests
basFtdTableRequests.description: Count of the total number of table requests.

basFtdTablePackets.name: basFtdTablePackets
basFtdTablePackets.description: Count of the total number of table packets.

basFtdAllocatedPackets.name: basFtdAllocatedPackets
basFtdAllocatedPackets.description: Count of the total number of allocated packets.

basFtdSentPackets.name: basFtdSentPackets
basFtdSentPackets.description: Count of the total number of packets sent.

basFtdFreedPackets.name: basFtdFreedPackets
basFtdFreedPackets.description: Count of the total number of packets freed.

basFtdSpuriousUpdatePackets.name: basFtdSpuriousUpdatePackets
basFtdSpuriousUpdatePackets.description: Count of the total number of spurious update packets.

basFtdSpuriousTablePackets.name: basFtdSpuriousTablePackets
basFtdSpuriousTablePackets.description: Count of the total number of spurious table packets.

basFtdIgnoredUpdatePackets.name: basFtdIgnoredUpdatePackets
basFtdIgnoredUpdatePackets.description: Count of the total number of ignored update packets.

basFtdIgnoredTablePackets.name: basFtdIgnoredTablePackets
basFtdIgnoredTablePackets.description: Count of the total number of ignored table packets.

basFtdInstalledUpdatePackets.name: basFtdInstalledUpdatePackets
basFtdInstalledUpdatePackets.description: Count of the total number of installed update packets.

basFtdInstalledTablePackets.name: basFtdInstalledTablePackets
basFtdInstalledTablePackets.description: Count of the total number of installed table packets.

basFtdStoredTablePackets.name: basFtdStoredTablePackets
basFtdStoredTablePackets.description: Count of the total number of stored table packets.

basFtdRevisionPackets.name: basFtdRevisionPackets
basFtdRevisionPackets.description: Count of the total number of sent(rs) or received (fwd) revision packets.

basFtdFailureCode.name: basFtdFailureCode
basFtdFailureCode.description: Log of the most recent failure code.

basFtdRevision.name: basFtdRevision
basFtdRevision.description: FTD update revision (write only for testing).

basFtdPresentFsmState.name: basFtdPresentFsmState
basFtdPresentFsmState.description: Current FTD finite state maching state.

basFtdFsmRestarts.name: basFtdFsmRestarts
basFtdFsmRestarts.description: Count of the total number of FTD object restarts since a cold boot.
